name: PaPaPa-Enjoy Hot Shoot（Popular Basketball Game）
description:
Celebrate father's day, this game limited free download a week (6.18-6.25).

This is a super popular shooting game, simple operation, perfect sound, realistic effects, you absolutely can not miss.

Fingers hold the corresponding scores, drag to change the shooting angle, and lift up . It's so simple to complete a shoot. Every boys, come and enjoy the hot passion of street basketball.
